ingredients.item: 2 medium essential Waitrose Free Range Eggs

instructions.step: Bring a large pan of water with the vinegar to the boil and stir, gently add 1 egg and poach for 2-3 minutes or until your liking, and repeat with the remaining egg.
Meanwhile, place the spinach in a large bowl and microwave for 1 minute until just wilted, then season.
Toast the bread, spread with mayonnaise and top with the spinach. Place a poached egg onto each piece of toast and sprinkle with seeds and black pepper.
